bug.author: waqasakram117
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
gives error when I'm trying to freez model <denchmark-h:h2>Step to reproduce</denchmark-h>
checked using tensorflow 1.14 and tensorflow 1.15 using output_node_names as output_node_names = "save_1/restore_all" Got Input 0 of node import/save_1/AssignVariableOp was passed float from import/batch_normalization/beta:0 incompatible with expected resource. error
<denchmark-h:h2>Output</denchmark-h>
Share what your terminal says when you run the script (as well as what you would expect). <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
OS MacOS
Installation type pip
<denchmark-h:h2>Additional context</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Hi @waqas117 Closing this but you may want to check <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/issues/155>#155</denchmark-link>
